headline: PowerSecure Partners with Edged to Advance Eco-Friendly Data Centers Across the Country
summary: PowerSecure, The Southern Company (NYSE:SO)’s subsidiary known for its cutting-edge energy solutions, has announced an expanded partnership with Edged, a top developer of highly efficient and sustainable data centers and digital infrastructure. Under this collaboration, PowerSecure will deliver advanced power distribution systems to support Edged’s data centers across the US. This growing alliance began with […]

headline: Jefferies upgrades Southern Company as it sees long-term earnings boost
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies upgraded Southern Company (NYSE:SO) to Buy from Hold, citing stronger-than-expected long-term earnings growth potential driven by upcoming project wins and reduced regulatory risk.

raw.headline: Jefferies upgrades Southern Company as it sees long-term earnings boost
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies upgraded Southern Company (NYSE:SO) to Buy from Hold, citing stronger-than-expected long-term earnings growth potential driven by upcoming project wins and reduced regulatory risk.

headline: PowerSecure collaborates with Edged to promote sustainable data centers nationwide
summary: PowerSecure, a subsidiary of Southern Company and a leading provider of innovative energy solutions, today announced its alliance with Edged, a premier developer of ultra-efficient, sustainable data centers and next-generation digital infrastructure, to supply advanced power distribution solutions to Edged data centers across the United States.
